tone_notes: Emphasize operational reliability, documentation-first mindset, and cross-functional execution—aligning with Agile Defense’s 6H values (especially Helpful, Honest, and Hustle). Avoid overly academic or theoretical language; focus on shipped solutions, measurable impact, and team enablement.
summary_angle: Position Conner as a security engineer who builds and operates production-grade DLP systems—not just policy designers—highlighting his automation-first approach, endpoint hardening expertise, and experience translating compliance requirements into deployable controls.
